name: bluetooth-icon-visibility
description: Bluetooth icon should be visible in the ConnMan UI

steps.description: Check that Bluetooth icon is visible in the technology field

author: zingile

name: bluetooth-label-visibility
description: Bluetooth label should be visible in the ConnMan UI

steps.description: Check that Bluetooth label is visible in the technology field

author: zingile

name: bluetooth-switch-visibility
description: Bluetooth switch button should be visible in the ConnMan UI.

steps.description: Check that Bluetooth switcher is visible

author: zingile

name: bluetooth-switch-on
description: Bluetooth connection should be enabled when the Bluetooth switch button is toggled on 'I'. User should be able to see the available Bluetooth services.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is disabled (Bluetooth switch button is toggled on 'O' in ConnMan UI and ConnMan extension)
- Bluetooth AP and Bluetooth test devices are configured and visible by others
- All the other technology are disabled (Ethernet, Wifi, 3G)

steps.description: Click on the Bluetooth switcher to enable Bluetooth technology
steps.expected: Bluetooth switcher of ConnMan UI, ConnMan extension, Bluetooth applet and Bluetooth panel is toggled on 'I'. Bluetooth icon becomes bold. Available Bluetooth services appears in the service field. Bluetooth applet icon becomes bold.

steps.description: Open a terminal and execute the following command : 'connmanctl technologies'

author: zingile

name: bluetooth-switch-off
description: Bluetooth technology should be disabled when the Bluetooth switch button is toggled on 'O'.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled (on all UI : ConnMan extension, ConnMan UI, Bluetooth panel, Bluetooth applet, bluetooth switchers are toggled on 'I') 
- All other technology are disabled (Ethernet, Wifi and 3G)

steps.description: Click on the Bluetooth switcher to disable Wifi technology
steps.expected: Bluetooth switcher of ConnMan UI,  ConnMan extension, Bluetooth applet and Bluetooth panel is toggled on 'O'. Bluetooth icon becomes grayed. Service field displays 'No network connection available'

author: zingile
